name: FightCore
description: FightCore but now loaded form a simple JSON File

name: SmashDeveloper
description: A list of tools and resources made by the smash community

name: 20XXTE
description: Welcome to the next generation of Super Smash Bros. Melee. 20XXTE is a highly-polished Melee mod designed to completely replace vanilla Melee in any setting, home or tournament. It can be run on any Gamecube or Wii with nothing but a memory card and a special save file - no hacking or homebrew required. (NTSC v1.02 only; v1.00 and v1.01 have limited features for compatibility in running tournaments)

name: Purah
description: A Discord bot specifically designed for Discord communities around the game Super Smash Bros. Ultimate
